Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Scientific responsible for the for the literary property (literarischer Nachlass) from my grandfather Heinz Risse (1898-1989); Risse was a German writer of novels, short stories and essays, he received the René-Schickele-Preis (1952) and the Immermann-Preis (1956) awarded by the city of Düsseldorf (Germany).

Member of the editorial board: Gordischer Knoten Kosovo/a: Durchschlagen oder entwirren? Völkerrechtliche, rechtsvergleichende und politikwissenschaftliche Analysen und Perspektiven zum jüngsten Balkankonflikt. Baden-Baden: Nomos (1998/1999), ed. by Joseph Marko et al. (Italy, Germany, Serbia, Kosovo)
Translation German-Russian: Bulatov, D. (1998): Točka srenija. Visual’naja Poesija 90-e gody. Kaliningrad-Königsberg: Simplizij (Russian Federation)
Member of the editorial staff of "Academia", the quarterly scientific periodical of the European Academy Bolzano (EURAC), published in Italian, German, English (Italy)

Member of the editorial board and contributor to the European Yearbook of Minority Issues Vol. 1 (2001/2002), edited by European Academy Bolzano und European Centre for Minority Issues ECMI Flensburg (Italy, Germany)
Scientific responsible for the publications of the European Academy Bolzano-Bozen "Arbeitshefte/Quaderni" (Italy)
Member of the editorial board: Künstlerbuch Misha Le Jen – a,c,t,i,o,n,s (2009), München: Verlag Peter Kirchheim, published in German, Italian, Russian and English (Italy, Germany)

Member of the editorial board: Regionale Zivilgesellschaft in Bewegung – Cittadini innanzi tutto. Festschrift für/Scritti in onore di Hans Heiss. Wien/Bozen: Folio (2012), ed. by Hannes Obermair, Stephanie Risse, Carlo Romeo (Italy)

Member of the editorial board of the second edition "Jazyk, Licnost, Kul'tura" (Language, Person, Culture), Faculty of Romance and German Studies, Kuban State University Krasnodar (Russian Federation)
Invited as author for „Lemmapaket 20“: Lexikologie und Phraseologie. Wörterbücher zur Sprach- und Kommunikationswissenschaft (WSK), ed. by Christiane Fellbaum, Ingo H. Warnke

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Lecturer: „Sieg und Frieden – Zum sprachlichen und politischen Handeln in der Stadt Bozen/Bolzano/Bulsan“ 07.07.2006, Symposium „Stadt als kommunikativer Raum“ LIPP - Linguistisches Internationales Promotionsprogramm, Faculty of Languages and Literatures, Ludwig Maximilians University Munich (Germany)

Lecturer: „Interkulturalität und sprachliches Handeln. Italienisch und Deutsch im Gemeinderat der Stadt Bozen/Bolzano“ 27.09.2007, Annual Conference of „Gesellschaft für Angewandte Linguistik/Sektion Interkulturalität und mehrsprachige Diskurse“ University Hildesheim (Germany)
Training Course: “Schreibwerkstatt, Texten im Internet, Schulung für die Verwaltungsmitarbeiter UNIBZ“ 07./08.05.2008, Free University Bolzano (Italy)

Lecturer: „Was können linguistisch-pragmatische Untersuchungen von Sprache leisten?“ 22.10.2008 Conference of School Directors of the Autonomous Province of Bolzano, Cusanus-Akademie Bressanone (Italy)
Lecturer: „Institutionelle Kommunikation“ 10.12.2008, Faculty of Education, Free University Bolzano; joint activity with Goethe-Institut (Italy)

Lecturer: „Sieg und Frieden – Zum sprachlichen und politischen Handeln in der Stadt Bozen/Bolzano/Bulsan“ 06.02.2009, Colloquium for PhD students at „Institut für deutsches und europäisches Parteienrecht und Parteienforschung (PRuF)“, Heinrich-Heine-Universität Düsseldorf (Germany)
Training Course: „Sprachwerkstatt Deutsch. Seminar für die studentischen Stipendiaten der Roland-Berger-Stiftung“ 30.01.2010, Roland-Berger-Foundation Munich (Germany)
Lecturer: „Zur Kultur- und Institutionsspezifik sprachlichen Handelns am Beispiel Südtirol“ 17.07.2010, Workshop "Pragmatik und Sprachlehrforschung", Technical University TU Dortmund (Germany)

Lecturer: „‚Das Land’ oder ‚il territorio’- Zur Rekonstruktion ideologischen Wissens“ at „XII. Internationaler Germanistenkongress/IVG. Sektion: Diskurslinguistik im Spannungsfeld von Deskription und Kritik“ 06.08.2010 University of Warsaw (Poland)

Lecturer: „Mehrsprachig # interkulturell – Beobachtungen an der Freien Universität Bozen“ 17.09.2010, Annual Conference "Gesellschaft für Angewandte Linguistik (GAL)/Sektion Nr. 9 „Mehrsprachigkeit und interkulturelle Kommunikation in der Hochschule“ Universität Leipzig (Germany)

Lecturer: „Das Projekt KiIS – Kommunikation in Institutionen Südtirols – Transkripte mündlicher Diskurse“ 26.01.2012 at the Scientific Commitee of the Language Study Unit, Free University Bolzano (Italy)

Lecturer: „Zerschtl schaug man olm af die Respirazione – deutsche Varietäten auf dem Weg zur (in)offiziellen Standardisierung? 27.03.2012, "II. Diskussionsforum Linguistik in Bayern“ Ludwig Maximilians University Munich (Germany)

Lecturer: „10 Ören magari, sell moan i, hai da darmi il resto? – Institutional talk in Bolzano“ 05.05.2012, 2nd LINEE Conference: Multilingualism in the public sphere hosted by the Institute for Anthropological Research, Zagreb/Dubrovnik, Organizer: LINEE+ Languages in a Network of European Excellence (Croatia)
Lecturer: „Alltägliches Sprechen in Südtiroler Institutionen“ 11.02.2013 at the Scientific Commitee of the Language Study Unit, Free University Bolzano (Italy)

Lecturer: „Paziente der wos politraumatizzato af do Hauptstraße lieg – Kommunikation in Südtirol zwischen Italienisch, Standarddeutsch und Dialekt“ 14.05.2013, „Linguistisches Kolloquium“, University Duisburg-Essen, Campus Essen (Germany)

Lecturer (with Prof. Dr. Rita Franceschini): „Multilingual Literacies: A Transversal Study with Trilingual Children” 13.06.2013, ISB 9 International Symposium on Bilingualism, Nanyang Technological University Singapore (Republic of Singapore)

Lecturer and book presentation: „Sieg und Frieden. Zum sprachlichen und politischen Handeln in Südtirol/ Sudtirolo/Alto Adige“ 29.07.2013 at the „Internationale Deutschlehrertagung" (IDT) Free University Bolzano (Italy)

Lecturer (with Rita Franceschini): „Erwerb von Schriftlichkeit im mehrsprachigen Kontext: eine Transversalstudie bei dreisprachigen Kindern und Jugendlichen“ 19.12.2013, BMBF-Kick-off-Workshop, Ludwig Maximilians University Munich (Germany)
Lecturer: "Die deutsche Sprache in Südtirol: Standard-Dialekt-Italienisch-Kontinuum", 04.02.2014 Faculty of Philology and History, University Augsburg (Germany)

Scientific Co-Organizer: 1. LRI Workshop “Language, Region and Identity" - Lingua, Regione ed Identità nella comunicazione mediata dal computer, 13./14.06.2014, joint activity with European Academy Bolzano, Ludwig Maximilians University Munich, University Zurich, Accademia di Studi Italo-Tedeschi Merano (Italy, Germany Switzerland)

Scientific Co-Organizer and Lecturer: “Societal multilingualism in South Tyrol: Language contact, diglossia and the dominance of the German-speaking minority” 15.09.2014 at the International/Interdisciplinary Summer School “Alps-Caucasus: Nature & Culture” (Part 1) with 14 Days Excursion with Students from Austria, Italy, Russia at the Region of Krasnodar and Sotschi, joint Activity with Linguists, Geographers, Historians and Archaelogists from Leopold Franzens University Innsbruck, Kuban State University and Free University Bolzano (Russian Federation, Austria, Italy)

Scientific organizer of the Conference and lecturer: „Wie kann die Qualität von Schülertexten beurteilt werden?“ 16.10.2014 at the Free University Bolzano UNIBZ at the Conference „Grammatik – wozu? Perchè Grammatica“ for German Language Teachers (DaM/DaZ/DaF) of all School Types of the Autonomous Province of Bolzano-Bozen 16.-17.10.2014, joint activity with Südtiroler Kulturinstitut, Deutsches Bildungsressort Bozen and Prof. Dr. Ludger Hoffmann, Technical University TU Dortmund (Italy)

Lecturer (with Prof. Dr. Rita Franceschini): “Writing in a multilingual environment: data from the trilingual ladin school system in South Tyrol” 13.11.2014, Symposium “Multilingual discourse competence”, Ludwig Maximilians University Munich (Germany)

Scientific Organizer and Lecturer: „Sprech- und Redeanlässe im Unterricht unter Berücksichtigung der Standardsprache als Kommunikationsmittel im Unterricht“ 09.12.2014, Pädagogischer Tag des Grundschulsprengels Bruneck at the UNIBZ, joint activity with Deutsches Schulamt Bozen (Italy)

Lecturer: "Erzählanfänge in literarischen und Schüler/innen-Texten (3. Klasse deutsche und ladinische Mittelschule in Südtirol): Im Raum zwischen grammatischer Relevanz und kreativem Schreiben" 19.03.2015, School of Education, Leopold Franzens University Innsbruck (Austria)

Co-Organizer: Sektion A13 "Diskursbedeutung und Grammatik – Transtextuelle und gesprächsübergreifende Aspekte grammatischer Inventare" 24.08.-30.08.2015 at the XIII. Internationaler Germanistenkongress/IVG in Shanghai with Prof. Dr. Ingo H. Warnke and Prof. Dr. Martin Reisigl. I could not attend the Conference, but I was scientific co-coordinator in the phase of preparation since 2010. (China)

Scientific Co-Organizer and Lecturer: „Trilingual eduaction: the paritetic school system in the Ladin Valleys" 17.09.2015 Leopold Franzens University Innsbruck at the International/Interdisciplinary Summer School “Alps-Caucasus: Nature & Culture” (Part 2), joint activity with Leopold Franzens University Innsbruck, Austrian Academy of Sciences and Kuban State University (Austria, Russian Federation, Italy)

Scientific Co-Organizer: 2. LRI Workshop “Language, Region and Identity - Lingua, Regione ed Identità nella comunicazione in contesti scolastici" 15.10.2015, joint activity with European Academy Bolzano, Ludwig Maximilians University Munich, Accademia di Studi Italo-Tedeschi Merano (Italy, Germany)
Lecturer: "Innere und äußere Mehrsprachigkeit – Herausforderungen für die Schule" 09.06.2016 Pedagogical University Tyrol Innsbruck (Austria)

Scientific Co-Organizer: 3. LRI Workshop “Language, Region and Identity in Secondary and Tertiary Education. Research Projects and Methodological Approaches” 14./15.09.2016, Institute of German Studies, Faculty of Humanities 2, Leopold Franzens University Innsbruck, joint activity with European Academy Bolzano, Ludwig Maximilians University Munich, Leopold Franzens University Innsbruck (Austria, Italy, Germany)

Lecturer: „Zusammenarbeit mit Hochschulbildungseinrichtungen“ 28.10.2016, Symposium of the „Sprachrat der Selbstorganisation der Russlanddeutschen und des Instituts für ethnokulturelle Bildung biz“, XIV. Forum of Russian Germans/Forum der Russlanddeutschen und 25 Jahre IVDK – Internationaler Verband der Deutschen Kultur, Moscow (Russian Federation)

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Scientific collaborator: Setting up of the "International research unit for multilingualism/Internationale Forschungsstelle für Mehrsprachigkeit IFM", Institute for German as a Foreign Language (Prof. Dr. Claudia Maria Riehl) Faculty of Languages and Literatures, Department I Ludwig Maximilians University Munich (Germany), responsible for acquiring third-party-funding

Scientific coordinator of the project "Road Map - Lingue, Sprachen in Alto Adige/South Tyrol" by order of the Department of Education, Universities and Research of the Regional Administration of the Autonomous Province of Bolzano/Amt für Bildungsförderung, Universität und Forschung der Autonomen Provinz Bozen (Italy)

Principal investigator of the project "Social Integration and career development support for students with migration backgrounds in vocational schools: Development of methods and models for language acquisition and monitoring - German as a second language/Förderung des Zugangs zum Erwerbsleben und der sozialen Eingliederung für Berufsschüler/innen mit Migrationshintergrund – Entwicklung von Modellen und Methoden zum Spracherwerb und Sprachbegleitung für Deutsch als Zweitsprache" by order of the Department of German Vocational Training of the Autonomous Province of Bolzano/Amt für deutschsprachige Berufsbildung der Autonomen Provinz Bozen, in cooperation with the Regional Vocational School for Crafts and Industry/Deutsche Berufsschule für Handwerk und Industrie LBS Bozen; Third-Party-Funding: European Social Fund ESF (18.000 € ) (Italy)

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Member of the Scientific Committee of the international and interdisciplinary "Summer School on Minority Rights and Autonomies in a Greater Europe", European Academy Bolzano and University of Graz (Italy, Austria)

International award/scholarship for the PhD project "Sieg und Frieden - Zum sprachlichen und politischen Handeln in Sudtirolo/Südtirol/Alto Adige" - promoting highly talented PhD students by Foundation Friedrich-Naumann-Stiftung für die Freiheit (Potsdam) financed through the Federal Ministry of Education and Research Berlin (Germany)
Member of the Scientific Committee of ISB 9 - International Symposium on Bilingualism June 2013 at Nanyang Technological University Singapore (Republic of Singapore)

Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: It is not foreseen in the PhD Programme (General Pedagogy, Social Pedagogy and General Education) of our Faculty of Education (UNIBZ) to participate as professor from SSD L-LIN 13/14.

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Student employee and interviewer: Research project "The origins, experience and integration of Russian Germans/Herkunftskontext, Migrationserfahrung und Integration von Russlanddeutschen", East-European Institute/Osteuropa Institut (OEI) Munich, third-party-funding: Foundation Volkswagen Stiftung and Federal Ministry of the Interior/Bundesministerium des Innern BMI (Germany, Soviet Union)

Student employee: Project (applied research, development of course book) „Schools in Central and Eastern Europe/Schulen in Mittel- und Osteuropa“, Landesinstitut für Erziehung und Unterricht at the Ministry of Education and Cultural Affairs/Kultusministerium Baden-Württemberg (Germany, Russian Federation)

Scientific responsible: Applied Research into the settlements of Russian-Germans in West Siberia on behalf of the Federal Commission on Emigration of the German Federal Government (Aussiedlerbeauftragter der Bundesregierung). This involved production of a brochure about a district in West Siberia known as the German National Region, as well as two thirty-minute television documentaries for Bavarian Broadcasting (Bayerischer Rundfunk) in Munich, broadcast on ARD, on the state of German language and culture in Novosibirsk, Omsk and the districts of Halbstadt and Asowo. (Russian Federation)

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: Principal Investigator/project manager: German-Russian language contact: Linguistic and cultural research in the region of Kaliningrad - applied research based on my MA-Thesis "Die Auswärtige Kulturpolitik der Bundesrepulik Deutschland in Blick auf die Russlanddeutschen" by order of the German Society for International Cooperation/Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit giz with funds from the Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development/Bundesministerium für wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung; acquisition of third-party-funding (230.000€) (Germany, Russian Federation)

Principal investigator/project manager: Open dialogue between different linguistic and ethnic groups during the reconstruction of ex-Yugoslavia/Dialogfähigkeit ethnischer Gruppen beim Wiederaufbau der Krisenregion Ex-Jugoslawiens, applied research (Ex-Yugoslavia: Serbia, Vojvodina, Kosovo) by order of the German Society for International Cooperation/Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit giz with funds from the Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development/Bundesministerium für wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung in cooperation with European Academy Bolzano (EURAC); acquisition of third-party-funding (103.000€) (Germany, Italy, Serbia Kosovo)
